name: devpost-hackathon
description: - Prettier: for code formatting - Live Server: for live preview of the code - Live Preview: for live preview of the code - GitHub Copilot: for code suggestions (i will assist you in signing up for it when we meet) - Bracket Pair Colorizer: for colorizing brackets - Auto Rename Tag: for renaming tags automatically - Path Intellisense: for auto-completing file paths - Code Spell Checker: for spell checking - Code Runner: for running code snippets - Code Snippets: for code snippets
